title: Textile, 1995-50-278-a,b,c, after 1785
medium: Block print on cotton plain weave.
dimensions:
a. Warp: 62cm (24 3/8 in.).Weft: (seam in center, selvage on right) 82cm (32 1/4in.)
b. Warp: 21 cm (8 1/4in.). Weft: 97cm (38 1/8 in. ).
c. Warp: 52.5cm (26 3/4in. ). Wef: (selvage on left) 9cm (3 1/2in.)
description: This is a block printed copy of an Oberkampf plate printed fabric, 'Hommage de l'Amerique a la France'. The colors are three reds and a lavender.
